text: Paul N. Lazarus III is an American film producer. In the 1960s he was an agent, his clients including Woody Allen. He ran his own production company and became chief of production for the film division of HBO. He spent a year as director of the New Mexico Film Commission then went to work for the University of Miami.LIGHTS, CAMERA, DIPLOMA!
